https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/3OTMelC4oXV3JqFX6aKBka8e7o3.jpg Derren Brown uses his skills on selected participants who answered an advertisement. Under the guise of attending a 'motivational seminar', Derren recruits a number of participants, eventually manipulating a number of them into robbing a security van in broad daylight. 'The Heist' has been described by Derren as one of the stunts of which he is most proud. Derren Brown: The Heist
